participant_1.background:
I sometimes trip over my own feet when I'm playing tennis.
I sometimes forget to water my plants, but I'm trying to be better about it.
i have often been called a slacker.
i am a civil war reenactment participant.
i like hiking up volcanoes.

participant_2.background:
My favorite holiday is Thanksgiving because I love to cook for my family and friends.
I'm proud that I'm able to provide a healthy alternative to sugary drinks for my family and community.
I own a computer that is suitable for my needs.
i am twenty five years old.
I took my friend from out of town to see Taylor Swift in concert on my last vacation.

content.text: Hey there!
Hi there!
How is your day going?
Pretty good so far! Just got back from a hike and now I'm making dinner.
What kind of hike did you go on?
I went to a local state park and hiked up to a lookout point with a beautiful view.
That sounds amazing! I love hiking but I'm not very good at it. I usually trip over my own feet.
Haha, that's okay! Everyone has to start somewhere. I've been hiking for years and I still fall sometimes.
I'm glad to hear that. I'm going to try to go hiking more often.
That's great! I'm sure you'll get better at it the more you do it.
Thanks for the encouragement!
You're welcome!
What's your favorite holiday?
I love Thanksgiving because I love to cook for my family and friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love Thanksgiving too.
What do you like to cook for Thanksgiving?
I usually make a turkey, mashed potatoes, stuffing, and green bean casserole.
That sounds delicious! I love mashed potatoes and green bean casserole.
Do you have any other hobbies besides hiking?
I also like to cook and bake, and I'm proud that I'm able to provide a healthy alternative to sugary drinks for my family and community.
That's awesome! I'm sure your family and community appreciates it.
They do! Thanks for chatting with me!
You're welcome! It was nice talking to you too!
